name: INROADS Capital Partners
overview: INROADS Capital Partners is a venture capital firm specializing in start-up, mid-stage, and late stage investments in women-owned and minority-owned businesses. It seeks to invest in consumer products and services, financial services, and technology sectors. The firm seeks to invest in United States. It seeks to invest between $1million and $4 million in companies having revenue between $10 million and $50 million and may occasionally take a controlling interest. INROADS Capital Partners was founded in 1995 and is based in Evanston, Illinois with an additional office in Chicago, Illinois.
